trans-unit.source: If you set the property to an empty string, the top of the content will be navigated to by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果将属性设置为空字符串时，内容的顶部将导航到默认情况下中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fragment navigation has been handled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对片段导航进行了处理。

trans-unit.source: If Handled is set to `false`, the system attempts to find an element with the name of the fragment and bring it into view.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Handled 设置为`false`，系统会尝试查找具有片段的名称的元素并将它放入视图。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation, you need to set Handled is set to `true` to override the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 当处理**FragmentNavigation**事件并使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>若要实现处理实现一个自定义内容片段，你需要设置 Handled 设置为`true`重写默认行为。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果导航进行了处理;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation"></xref> event.

A <xref:System.Object> that refers to the navigator ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.) that is navigating to the content fragment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>，是指导航器 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]， <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>。) 正在导航到内容片段。</xref:System.Object>
